Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-3730 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-3730 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.0.0-8, affected by CVE-2025-3730
